mapper.select: SELECT A.CLC_WRK_NO, A.SO_ID, A.P_SEQ, A.BILL_YYMM, A.BILL_CYCL, A.USE_YYMM, A.CTRT_ID, A.CUST_ID, A.PYM_ACNT_ID, A.ACT_DT, A.INACT_DT, A.RATE_STRT_DT, A.TERM_DT, A.CTRT_STAT, A.PROD_CD, A.PROD_CMPS_ID, A.SVC_CMPS_ID, A.SVC_STS_CD, A.SVC_TEL_NO, B.CHRG_CTGRY, B.RATE_ITM_CD, B.SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD, B.RACT_DT, B.RINACT_DT, A.USE_AMT, A.USE_QTY, A.USE_CNT, B.CRNCY_CD, A.REG_DATE, A.VAT, A.GRP_ID, A.USE_QTY_UT, C.TOT AS TOT_RCHRG, A.FCTR_CD1, A.FCTR_VAL1, A.FCTR_CD2, A.FCTR_VAL2, A.FCTR_CD3, A.FCTR_VAL3, A.FCTR_CD4, A.FCTR_VAL4, A.FCTR_CD5, A.FCTR_VAL5, A.FCTR_CD6, A.FCTR_VAL6, A.FCTR_CD7, A.FCTR_VAL7, A.FCTR_CD8, A.FCTR_VAL8, A.FCTR_CD9, A.FCTR_VAL9, A.SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD AS RSVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD, A.PROC_RATE FROM TBLCH_CHRG_TEMP A, (SELECT DISTINCT B.PROD_CD, B.CHRG_CTGRY, B.SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD, A.RATE_ITM_CD ,A.CRNCY_CD, A.ACT_DT AS RACT_DT, A.INACT_DT AS RINACT_DT, B.RATE_PRI_NO FROM IFNBRM_RATE_INFO A, IFNBRM_RATE_ITM_INFO B WHERE A.SO_ID = #{soId} AND A.SO_ID = B.SO_ID AND A.RATE_ITM_CD = B.RATE_ITM_CD AND B.CHRG_CTGRY ='D' AND B.RATE_LOCAT = 'B' AND A.ACT_DT <= #{endDate} AND A.INACT_DT >= #{startDate} AND B.ACT_DT <= #{endDate} AND B.INACT_DT >= #{startDate}) B, (SELECT CTRT_ID, SVC_CMPS_ID, ACT_DT, INACT_DT, SUM(USE_AMT) AS TOT FROM TBLCH_CHRG_TEMP WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND CLC_WRK_NO = #{clcWrkNo} AND P_SEQ = #{pSeq} AND CHRG_CTGRY = 'R' GROUP BY SO_ID, CTRT_ID, SVC_CMPS_ID, ACT_DT, INACT_DT) C WHERE A.SO_ID = #{soId} AND A.CLC_WRK_NO = #{clcWrkNo} AND A.P_SEQ = #{pSeq} AND A.CHRG_CTGRY = 'R' AND A.ACT_DT <= B.RINACT_DT AND A.INACT_DT >= B.RACT_DT AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD AND C.CTRT_ID = A.CTRT_ID AND C.SVC_CMPS_ID = A.SVC_CMPS_ID AND C.ACT_DT = A.ACT_DT AND C.INACT_DT = A.INACT_DT ORDER BY A.SO_ID, A.CTRT_ID, A.SVC_CMPS_ID, A.ACT_DT, A.PROD_CD, B.RATE_PRI_NO
